General.Name: Shree Renuka Sugars Limited
General.Description: Shree Renuka Sugars Limited manufactures and refines sugar in India and internationally. The company provides white/refined sugar, as well as by products, including molasses, bagasse, press mud, and organic manure; and ethyl alcohol from molasses and fuel grade ethanol. It also produces power from bagasse, a sugarcane by product for state grids. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India. Shree Renuka Sugars Limited is a subsidiary of Wilmar Sugar Holdings Pte. Ltd.
